trans-unit.source: Azure HDInsight Linked Service
trans-unit.target: Azure HDInsight Linked Service

trans-unit.source: Azure HDInsight Linked Service
trans-unit.target: Azure HDInsight Linked Service

trans-unit.source: This topic provides the JSON format that is supported by the July 2015 Release of Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: This topic provides the JSON format that is supported by the July 2015 Release of Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: If you are using an older version, see <link xlink:href="1a66a1b1-a81c-4218-bb8f-faa29daa45df" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure HDInsight BYOC Linked Service</link> for the old JSON format.
trans-unit.target: If you are using an older version, see <link xlink:href="1a66a1b1-a81c-4218-bb8f-faa29daa45df" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure HDInsight BYOC Linked Service</link> for the old JSON format.

trans-unit.source: You create an Azure HDInsight BYOC (bring-your-own-cluster) linked service to link your own Azure HDInsight cluster to an Azure data factory.
trans-unit.target: You create an Azure HDInsight BYOC (bring-your-own-cluster) linked service to link your own Azure HDInsight cluster to an Azure data factory.

trans-unit.source: This topic describes the JSON properties for defining a HDInsight linked service.
trans-unit.target: This topic describes the JSON properties for defining a HDInsight linked service.

trans-unit.source: When you use the Data Factory Editor in Azure Portal, the editor provides you a JSON template for defining a linked service that you can modify and deploy to create a linked service.
trans-unit.target: When you use the Data Factory Editor in Azure Portal, the editor provides you a JSON template for defining a linked service that you can modify and deploy to create a linked service.

trans-unit.source: To use the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.Azure.Commands.DataFactories.New-AzureDataFactoryLinkedService</codeEntityReference> cmdlet to create a linked service, you will need to create a JSON file and use it with the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: To use the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.Azure.Commands.DataFactories.New-AzureDataFactoryLinkedService</codeEntityReference> cmdlet to create a linked service, you will need to create a JSON file and use it with the cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: Example

trans-unit.source: Properties
trans-unit.target: Properties

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: type
trans-unit.target: type

trans-unit.source: The type property should be set to <embeddedLabel>HDInsight</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: The type property should be set to <embeddedLabel>HDInsight</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: clusterUri
trans-unit.target: clusterUri

trans-unit.source: The URI of the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: The URI of the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: username
trans-unit.target: username

trans-unit.source: Specify username to be used to connect to an existing HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Specify username to be used to connect to an existing HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: password
trans-unit.target: password

trans-unit.source: Specify password for the user account.
trans-unit.target: Specify password for the user account.

trans-unit.source: location
trans-unit.target: location

trans-unit.source: Specify the location of the HDInsight cluster (for example: WestUS).
trans-unit.target: Specify the location of the HDInsight cluster (for example: WestUS).

trans-unit.source: linkedServiceName
trans-unit.target: linkedServiceName

trans-unit.source: Name of the linked service for the blob storage used by this HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Name of the linked service for the blob storage used by this HDInsight cluster.
